channel.title: [718] How to make admin not be able to trade
channel.description:
[718] How to make admin not be able to trade [718] How to make admin not be able to drop items [718] How to make admin not be able to lose items on death
please all help is appreciated please no hate thanks guys :)

item.title: [718] How to make admin not be able to trade
item.dc:creator: @amirparvis amirparvis
item.description:
@amirparvis wrote:

[quote=“devenb123, post:10, topic:533705”]TradeHandler.java maybe?
When it says if player add an if statement defining the admin then add a dialogue saying “Admins cannot trade” instead of sending the player to the trade screen. Should be copy and pasting.[/quote]

No such file

Read full topic

item.title: [718] How to make admin not be able to trade
item.dc:creator: @devenb123 devenb123
item.description:
@devenb123 wrote:

TradeHandler.java maybe?
When it says if player add an if statement defining the admin then add a dialogue saying “Admins cannot trade” instead of sending the player to the trade screen. Should be copy and pasting.

item.title: [718] How to make admin not be able to trade
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

I don’t know how 718s handle player rights, but in word form: Create a check wherever it handles trading, item dropping, and item loss on death so that it checks if the player has administrator rights. If the player has administrator rights, then disallow trading, item dropping, and item loss on death.

Read full topic
